name: Francis E. WEAVER, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Shirley Moore Smeal, Acting Secretary, Office of Attorney General, Ronald C. Stanko, Administrative Law Judge, Chief Deputy Attorney General, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Weaver v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Francis E. WEAVER, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Shirley Moore Smeal, Acting Secretary, Office of Attorney General, Ronald C. Stanko, Administrative Law Judge, Chief Deputy Attorney General, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of May, 2011, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
18 A.3d 1145
Francis E. WEAVER, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Shirley Moore Smeal, Acting Secretary, Office of Attorney General, Ronald C. Stanko, Administrative Law Judge, Chief Deputy Attorney General, Appellees.

May 4, 2011.
